To navigate there comfortably, you are welcome to go through several modules over the next few weeks. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After its completion, you will perfectly:  \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\\n\\r\\r - know what people services to contact to get help  \\r\\n\\r - use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"24/7\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" self-service tools to orient in tools and workflows \\r\\n\\r\\r\\r - learn what benefits to avail from the first days \\r\\n\\r\\nYou can prioritize your efforts while completing onboarding programs - each of them has its own deadline. It’s better to read it carefully – it will save your time in the future and will boost your project performance. For your convenience every module has the preliminary time of completion, so you can plan your workload effectively. \\r\\n\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Start your journey now!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]}]}}"
